segments.text: Now people are talking about world recession which started more than a year ago . Can you give us your personal assessment of the situation of the global economy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you know , we are in a very special time . This is a very hard time for many countries ' economics , both developed and developing . I think the current economic situation could be described as synchronized slowdown of major economies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the direct impact of the terrorist attack upon your country's economy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Once the US economy is in trouble due to the terrorist attack , the impact could be quickly felt in the rest of the world .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What challenges is your country's economy facing at the moment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We do face a lot of challenges because there is still much uncertainty about the world economy . It's very important for us to strike a proper balance between investment in fixed assets and household consumption .
segments.speaker: S2
